scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a photograph greeting card with note signed by Virginia Caldwell, from Erskine and Virginia Caldwell to Clifton and Cornelia Barrett, showing the daisy field [with bears?] at the Caldwell's Arizona home.
